volunteering.organisation: Google Developer Students Clubs, VIT Vellore
volunteering.description: Worked on projects and participated in hackathons as a part of the Tech domain. Held informative sessions for students on topics such as socket programming. Helped organise events such as WomenTechies '22, '23 and DevJams '22, in which I was a panel member for the judging process.

experience.description: Engineered a parser to define and consume complex trading strategies while keeping in mind flexibility (via 10+ comparators and operators) and end-user modularity. Added support for 15 technical indicators, with in-depth documentation on how to add custom indicators. Built a CLI and a Web App to interact with the above backend for easy usage of the app, and visualised 8 metrics using an interactive graphic dashboard.

Assisted in development of end-to-end features on the BalkanID core application, on the app frontend as well as in the data pipeline and API (such as a consolidated action centre). Wrote a CLI tool to interact with 10 download APIs with support for associated parameters. Integrated tooling for product walkthroughs and AI access to help docs, and helped author a detailed internal document for development related to it.

Interned at NITI Aayog, the apex think tank of the Government of India, as part of the Science and Technology (S&T) Vertical. Built web pages and database schemas for some government projects. Constructed a well-received research report on FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) for Government in India, and associated opportunities, challenges and case studies.
